Package fr.unicaen.l2.info.prog.puzzle.model

Class Grille

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.unicaen.l2.info.prog.puzzle.model.AbstractModeleEcoutable
      • fr.unicaen.l2.info.prog.puzzle.model.Grille
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModeleEcoutable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Grille
extends AbstractModeleEcoutable
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Class represents the grid of the game where are placed the pieces. It inherits from AbstractModeleEcoutable class and implements Cloneable
    See Also:
    AbstractModeleEcoutable, Cloneable, Move, Piece
